mapper.select: select f.ucode, f.ftime, u.ustate, u.uimage, u.uatid, u.unickname, COUNT(*)OVER() as followingcnt from follow f, user_info u where u.ucode = f.ucode and f.fopcode = #{ucode} and u.ustate = '1' group by f.ucode, f.ftime, u.ustate, u.uimage, u.uatid, u.unickname
select bopcode from block where ucode = #{ucode}

select f.fopcode, f.ftime, u.ustate, u.uimage, u.uatid, u.unickname, COUNT(*)OVER() as followercnt from follow f, user_info u where u.ustate = '1' and f.ucode = #{ucode} and u.ucode = f.fopcode group by f.fopcode, f.ftime, u.ustate, u.uimage, u.uatid, u.unickname
select ucode from block where bopcode = #{ucode}

select f.ucode, f.ftime, u.ustate, u.uimage, u.uatid, u.unickname, COUNT(*)OVER() as followercnt from follow f, user_info u where u.ustate = '1' and f.fopcode = (select ucode from user_info where uatid = #{uatid}) and u.ucode = f.ucode group by f.ucode, f.ftime, u.ustate, u.uimage, u.uatid, u.unickname
select f.ucode, Count(*)over() as bfollowercnt from follow f, block b where f.fopcode = (select ucode from user_info where uatid = #{uatid}) and f.fopcode = b.ucode and f.ucode=b.bopcode

select f.fopcode, f.ftime, u.ustate, u.uimage, u.uatid, u.unickname, COUNT(*)OVER() as followingcnt from follow f, user_info u where u.ustate = '1' and f.ucode = (select ucode from user_info where uatid = #{uatid}) and u.ucode = f.fopcode group by f.fopcode, f.ftime, u.ustate, u.uimage, u.uatid, u.unickname
select f.fopcode, Count(*)over() as bfollowingcnt from follow f, block b where f.ucode = (select ucode from user_info where uatid = #{uatid}) and f.fopcode = b.ucode and f.ucode=b.bopcode
mapper.delete: delete from follow where ucode = #{ucode} and fopcode = #{fopcode}
